answers.answer: You could be getting musce spasms if you are low on sodium or your electrolites etc.  Try drinking some gatoraide, eat some bananas.  Just a thought.  You might want to have the doctor check those because it can be dangerous.  I started having muscle spasms in my feet and then calves and a little over a week later I was passing out and ended up in the ER.  I was on fluids for 4 days to get my sodium and poassium back to normal levels.Did your doctor tell you you have lupus or he thinks you have lupus.  It sounds like you have a positive ANA.  Did he mention a pattern?  Did he say you should see a Rheumatologist?  You mention hypothyroid.  Do you have that?  If you have been diagnosed with hypothyroidism and have a positive ANA you should have a doctor check your Thyroid antibodies for Hashimotos.  not trying to scare you but that would be better than lupus.You also mention diabetes.  Do you have diabetes?  Just trying to get some facts so people on here can help you maybe find some answers or at least know what questions to ask.God Bless,Joni
